Address.label: Address
Address.value: 901 HEARTLAND WAY, NORTH LIBERTY, Iowa, 52317, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Heartland Express Inc is engaged in providing truckload services across the United States and Canada. These truckload services are primarily asset-based transportation services in the dry van truckload market, and it also offers truckload temperature-controlled transportation services. The company's major customers represent primarily the consumer goods, appliances, food products, and automotive industries.
